reviews.review_msg: You want to learn French and have fun? Then Cathrine is the right prof for you!

Lovely Lady, as everyone else has mentioned, helpful, kind, positive attitude, her classes are uctually fun, as fun as any french course could possibly get. Even if sick, she comes to school with a smile on her face, ready to go - always!
Very good prof, who loves chocolate ;) hint hint... Best french teacher i've had in my life... NO JOKE!

Prof Blanchard is wonderful- the best french teacher in the department. She cares so much about her students. Always willing to help even if i am not in her class at the moment. if you have a chance to have her as a prof, take the class! She is well worth it!

ahh.. catherine.. shes delightful. I absolutely recommend her to anyone taking french. She's hilarious. She's also so willing to help if you go to her that is. Attend class and participate, even if you are wrong, she loves those who try..
